import React from 'react'; import './Description.css'; import emp from '../Assets/emp7.png' import Navbar from '../Components/Navbar'; import Footer from '../Components/Footer'; import StripeCheckout from "react-stripe-checkout"; function description() { const [product, setProduct] = useState({ name: "Uzhavan", // Changed to lowercase 'name' price: 10, productBy: "uki", }); const makePayment = (token) => { const body = { token, product, }; const headers = { "Content-Type": "application/json", }; return fetch("http://localhost:3000/payment", { // Ensure the backend server is running on this port method: "POST", headers, body: JSON.stringify(body), }) .then((response) => { console.log("Response:", response); const { status } = response; console.log("Status:", status); }) .catch((error) => console.log(error)); }; return ( <> {/*
*/}
